title: Eh bbys gotta love that patcher
body:
So yeah might have finally fixed my patcher. Keen for Bard. 

2 months of waiting paid off I suppose.

replies.body: I'm guessing you sent the error logs or w/e if not that's all I could think to do.

Rito please, I mean no harm. {{summoner:3}} 

http://i58.tinypic.com/156qtfd.png[/IMG]
What do you mean the client stopped, mine stopped downloading at like 80 something percent but I just left it for like half an hour and it started again.
I lied it's stopped again, gg. {{summoner:3}} {{item:3070}} {{summoner:3}}
